Errors.passwordRequired: Le mot de passe est requis
Errors.passwordMin: Le mot de passe doit contenir plus de 8 caractères
Errors.passwordMax: Le mot de passe doit contenir moins de 32 caractères

Hero.title: Welcome to EZ Start
Hero.description: EZ Start is my Boilerplate that provides a comprehensive and flexible starting point for your web development projects. Built with modern technologies and best practices, it helps you kickstart your development process with a robust foundation.

FeaturesList.title: Features
FeaturesList.description: Explore the powerful technologies and tools integrated into this boilerplate, designed to enhance your development workflow and deliver high-quality web applications.

features.title: Next.js Framework
features.description: Enjoy the power and flexibility of Next.js for server-side rendering, static site generation, and client-side rendering.

features.title: TypeScript Support
features.description: Benefit from TypeScript's type-checking and autocompletion for a more robust and maintainable codebase.

features.title: Prisma ORM
features.description: Easily manage your database with Prisma, a next-generation ORM that provides powerful data modeling and querying capabilities.

features.title: NextAuth Authentication
features.description: Secure your application with NextAuth, a flexible and easy-to-implement authentication solution.

features.title: Internationalization
features.description: Reach a global audience with built-in support for multiple languages using next-intl.

features.title: Theme Management
features.description: Customize your application's appearance with next-themes, allowing for easy theme switching.

features.title: Security
features.description: Protect user data with bcryptjs for password hashing and JWT token verification.

features.title: Styling
features.description: Create beautiful user interfaces with Tailwind CSS, a utility-first CSS framework.

features.title: Code Quality
features.description: Maintain high code quality with ESLint and Prettier integrations.

GetStarted.title: Get Started
content: To get started with My EZ Start Boilerplate, clone the repository and follow the setup instructions in the README file. Customize the configuration files to suit your project needs, and start building your application with ease.
This boilerplate is designed to be flexible and extensible, allowing you to add features and modify existing ones to fit your specific requirements.

content.paragraph: Hi, I'm Franck, a passionate web developer with expertise in creating dynamic and responsive web applications. With a strong background in Next.js, React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS, I strive to build seamless and user-friendly digital experiences.

Over the years, I've worked on various projects, ranging from small personal websites to large-scale enterprise applications. My commitment to continuous learning and improvement has allowed me to stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies.

I'm always excited to collaborate on new projects and bring innovative ideas to life. Feel free to explore my portfolio and connect with me on LinkedIn and GitHub to stay updated with my latest work and contributions.
